duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage client relationships and administer accounts in accordance with the terms of governing documents, statutes, and internal policies and procedures.
Proactively identify opportunities to deepen relationships with current clients and maintain a referral network inside and outside of the organization.
Review proposed and current estate plans to assess appropriateness to prospect and/or client’s objectives and the viability to serve their needs.
Maintain knowledge of investments, tax, and legal issues affecting the fiduciary industry and complete ongoing technical education to further professional competencies.
Participate in community involvement activities to enhance visibility, image, and reputation, and attend and participate in client development sponsored community events.

education_certification.credential: 3+ years of Trust Officer experience OR Estate Planning experience with legal background
